title: LipDub AI
description:
LipDub AI is a proprietary AI lip sync solution built to surpass the limitations of other tools and deliver the most natural, expressive lip sync for all live-action and AI-generated videos. Translate videos into multiple languages or tailor dialogue for specific audiences in minutes. To create new content, build a digital twin or choose an AI actor, type a script, and your video is ready instantly.

It’s the fastest way to create ultra-relevant content for any audience, anywhere in the world.
